overview:
ZarpZ.com assists patients with a terminal illness to create legacy material that can be shared with loved ones in the FUTURE.

ZarpZ provides an internet platform for creating legacy material - stories about one’s own life, advice to loved ones, or hopes and dreams for those left behind. Once this material is created, the user will have the ability to deliver the content to recipients on FUTURE dates. ZarpZ is committed to enriching the lives of people by allowing them to harness the power of personal memories to connect, express and leave behind something important.
